featured.title: What No One Actually Tells You About Starting a Website in 2025 (I Learned the Hard Way)
featured.description: After launching 12 websites over 3 years (and watching 8 of them fail), here are the brutal truths no one mentions in those glossy tutorials. Real talk about what it actually takes to build something that matters.
featured.author: Alex Rivera
